description: A rose is a flowering plant known for its beauty and fragrance.
Sunflowers are tall flowers known for large yellow heads and seeds.
Tulips are colorful, bulbous flowers that bloom in the spring.
Orchids are exotic flowers known for their unique shapes and colors.
Cacti are desert plants with thick, fleshy stems that store water.
Bamboo is a fast-growing grass used in construction and crafts.
Mango are desert plants with thick, fleshy stems that store water.
Apple is a fast-growing grass used in construction and crafts.
